content: I like the idea of creating a Reel series, and I think it could be a great way to provide value to my audience. I've been thinking about doing a series on self-care and mindfulness, which is a topic that's really important to me and my followers. I've already had success with a collaboration on a Q&A session about mental health and self-care, and I think a Reel series could be a great way to build on that momentum.
